title: The biodiversity gain plan: draft template and guidance

content.text: Calling all developers and local authorities: following testing with stakeholders, we are pleased to share the finalised biodiversity gain plan template, alongside guidance and information on the biodiversity gain plan.
The biodiversity gain plan template and guidance documents
Please click on the links below to access the PDFs.
Q&A on the biodiversity gain plan
What is the biodiversity gain plan?
What is the procedure for the biodiversity gain plan?
Who should use the biodiversity gain plan template?
How has the biodiversity gain plan template been developed?
Is the biodiversity gain plan going to be an additional burden for both developers and LPAs?
